content:
Hey,

Well, We use condensed milk for many recipes, Including Eggless Cakes, Kheer, and lotsa more yummy stuff..


Now, why buy that overpriced canned stuff? When you can make Fresh at home, that too with real natural ingredients..






That sounds easy, and yet is perfect for any dish.. But, I love licking it...





That’s it for today, Hope to hear from you soon 

Thanks for stopping by,

title: Homemade Condensed Milk Recipe | Basic Recipes

steps.text: In a pan, pour in the milk and add the sugar.
Heat this up in medium-high flame, stirring regularly. It should take about 20 mins for it to reduce. Milk can froth up and boil over anytime, keep an eye.
We just need to stir this and cook, that's it. Suddenly after 17-18 mins you should see a very vibrant color to it and the texture will be very frothy.
Switch off the flame and add the baking soda(optional). Stir well and let it cool.
Once cooled, stir well and store or use immediately.
